title: Olivia Attwood seen for first time since engagement to Bradley Dack
text:
Olivia Attwood has been spotted for the first time since announcing her engagement to Bradley Dack.

The reality star, 28, flashed a coy smile as she returned to work in Essex on Tuesday, joining her co-star Chloe Sims to film scenes for the ITVBe show.

The former Love Island favourite appeared to be getting her dazzling, teardrop shaped engagement ring resized following her footballer partner's romantic proposal in Dubai.

Back to reality: Olivia Attwood has been spotted for the first time since announcing her engagement to Bradley Dack, stepping out in Essex in Monday to film TOWIE scenes

Olivia was instead sporting a thinner band on her ring finger, holding her hand up to her face to show off the bling.

Fresh from her lavish getaway and whirlwind celebrations, the blonde showed no sign of tiredness as she busied herself for another big day on set.

Getting it resized? The former Love Island favourite appeared to be getting her dazzling, teardrop shaped engagement ring resized

Opting for comfort, Olivia sported a fluffy red coat, navy tartan scarf and skinny jeans.

She wore her long blonde locks down in perfect curls and highlighted her cheekbones with bronzer.

The outspoken TV personality styled her look with a quilted khaki bag and a pair of quirky lace-up ankle boots.

Olivia was no doubt thrilled to reunite with her TOWIE pals and share her happy news with them all.

Overjoyed: The reality star, 28, flashed a coy smile as she stepped out following her big announcement over the weekend

No jet lag here: Fresh from her lavish getaway and whirlwind celebrations, the blonde showed no sign of tiredness

Olivia was instead sporting a thinner band on her ring finger, holding her hand up to her face to show off the bling

Dressed down: Opting for comfort, Olivia sported a fluffy red coat, navy tartan scarf and skinny jeans

Also joining her on set was TOWIE veteran Chloe Sims, who embraced a casual look in a pair of leather look tracksuit bottoms.

Olivia - who has been in an on/off relationship with the footballer, 25, for four years - shared sweet Instagram snaps of the pair kissing along the beach in Dubai on Sunday evening following the romantic proposal.

Flashing her sparkling pear ring in the images, the star joked the sportsman 'must be crazy' as she and her new fiancé posed on the sandy shores of the holiday hotspot.

Filming together: Also joining her on set was TOWIE veteran Chloe Sims

Sporty: The star embraced a casual look in a pair of leather look tracksuit bottoms

Working it: Fashion-conscious Chloe shrugged a grey blazer over her shoulders

The 2017 Love Island contestant - who recently underwent a £2,500 jawline, chin lipo and contouring procedure - captioned the photos: 'He must be crazy... Here’s to forever . I love you BD.'

TV star Olivia dressed up for the occasion as she opted for bridal white in a lace gown, while her partner sported a black T-shirt with beige trousers.

The Celebs Go Dating personality was met with praise from her celeb pals as former Love Island co-star Gabby Allen commented: 'OH MY GOD!!! Congratulations you two. Wowwwwwww ❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️', while TOWIE's Bobby Norris wrote: 'Congrats bub!! ❤️' [sic].

'He must be crazy': Olivia announced her engagement to Bradley on Instagram on Sunday evening, following a four-year on/off relationship

Set to wed! The reality star showed off her sparkling pear ring just moments after her new fiancé popped the question

How sweet: The 2017 Love Island contestant captioned the photos: 'He must be crazy... Here’s to forever. I love you BD'

Exciting times ahead: Olivia and the Blackburn Rovers midfielder jetted off to the sunny country over the weekend

Olivia Buckland - who became the first Love Island couple to tie the knot with Alex Bowen last September also penned: 'Congratulations! This is so beautiful! ❤️❤️❤️.'

Olivia and the Blackburn Rovers midfielder - who jetted off to the sunny country over the weekend - first embarked on a relationship in 2015, but broke up when she appeared on ITV2's Love Island two years later - where she dated co-star Chris Hughes.

After the breakdown of her seven-month romance with reality star Chris, 26, the blonde beauty went on the search for love as she appeared on 2018's Celebs Go Dating.

'Congratulations!' The Celebs Go Dating personality was met with praise from her celeb pals as the likes of Gabby Allen, Yazmin Oukhellou and Amber Davies

Despite flirting up a storm with Diversity's Sam Craske on the E4 show, Olivia rekindled things with hunky Bradley in December last year.

The former grid girl's engagement may come as a surprise to fans as she recently admitted she can't trust Bradley '100%', and even split in April for just under 24 hours.

Olivia told new! magazine last month: 'We row about little things, like house-related things. I'm very OCD and he's very messy.

'I've also got a long way to go with trust. That's my own issue more than his. I don't think you should trust any man 100 per cent.'

Exes: After the breakdown of her seven-month romance with reality star Chris (pictured in 2017), 26, the blonde beauty went on the search for love as she appeared on Celebs Go Dating

Brief fling: Despite flirting up a storm with Diversity's Sam Craske on the E4 show (pictured last year), Olivia rekindled things with hunky Bradley in December last year

Despite her recent comments, the media personality insisted her romance with the Greenwich native is 'more serious than ever' and admitted she's 'old-fashioned' when it comes to marriage in an exclusive interview with MailOnline.

Comparing the first time they dated to their current relationship, the bombshell said in June: 'It was a childish relationship, but now we’ve realised what we want.

'We take the relationship more seriously than before. We've eased into living together, it feels quite normal now and he’s an easy person to live with.

When quizzed about marriage plans, the reality star admitted: 'You’d have to ask him about marriage. I’m not old-fashioned at all, but I am when it comes to marriage.'
